name: Loader Animations
description:
A selection of loaders and other loading interactive components created as part of a tutorial series on YouTube:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J6MSuRvi17M&ab_channel=WillBrettDesign


These interactive components are just a few simple ideas on how to get creative with creating loading animations.


Follow along with my YouTube videos to learn more about other areas of product design and working with Figma.


https://willbrettdesign.co.uk for my professional portfolio
